description: Try our easy to follow Goat’s Cheese & Chilli Jam recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Goat’s Cheese & Chilli Jam Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make the jam, pulse 400g tomatoes, 2 red chillies, 2 thumbs peeled fresh ginger, 2 tbsp fish sauce, and 3 peeled garlic cloves in a food processor until chunky.Place 75ml red wine vinegar and 200g caster sugar into a saucepan and bring to a boil. Stir, then add the tomato mixture and 50g raisins and simmer gently for 1 hour over low heat until thick. Cool and store the jam. Serve on oatcakes with goat’s cheese and garnish with chives.
